projects.title: Track Dev Time
projects.description: Project-focused development time tracker: install it in a repo and it automatically records your coding sessions and breaks. Your data stays local and transparent, and is showcased in a modern dashboard to track your productivity and goals.

content.context: Before Track Dev Time, tracking development sessions was tedious: developers had to remember to start, pause, or stop the timer, and the data was often incomplete.
content.objective: I created Track Dev Time, a tool that automatically tracks sessions and breaks directly from the terminal, stores data locally, and displays it in a modern dashboard. The tool allows developers to visualize their productivity, track goals, and analyze statistics easily, while keeping full control over their data.

projects.title: Auto Depannage Romanais
projects.description: Complete redesign of the company’s showcase website to better reflect its brand identity and graphic charter. Goal: modernize the design, improve user experience, and present services clearly and attractively.

content.context: I developed the website for Auto Dépannage Romanais to provide a more modern version compared to their previous site and better aligned with the company’s brand identity.
content.objective: The site highlights the services offered and improves user navigation while delivering a clear and professional design, consistent with the company’s visual identity.

projects.title: Les jardins de la Drôme
projects.description: Creation of the new Les Jardins de la Drôme website to meet their latest requirements.

content.context: The owner of Les Jardins de la Drôme contacted me to create a new website that better reflects the company’s current activities and positioning.
content.objective: The goal was to modernize the presentation of services and give them full control over their content to manage future updates themselves. I designed and developed the site to fully meet their needs and expectations.

projects.title: Archimède
projects.description: Creation of a web application designed to simplify event entry. Features include user rights management, event list display, and ICS conversion for seamless integration into calendar views.

content.context: The Archimède group, composed of companies and associations in the Drôme region, wanted a web application to centralize and simplify the management of their partners' events, which were previously tracked using a shared Excel file.
content.objective: I developed an application that allows each group user to have an account linked to their company or association. Each user can create events and view those of others, with a calendar view and a list view featuring sorting and filtering options to simplify navigation and organization.

projects.title: Cedille Formation
projects.description: Transformation of a landing page into a comprehensive website for Cédille Formation, integrating both showcase and training catalog. Backend server enhancements and dashboard customization to meet client expectations.

content.context: Cedille Formation was using a third-party service to display its training program, with limited control over the content, and had a landing page redirecting to this service.
content.objective: I developed a WordPress site to combine these two functionalities into a single platform. To meet the client’s needs and provide full control over the training content, I created custom content types for trainings, trainers, and related programs. I then developed the front-end of the site and wrote SEO-optimized articles to improve online visibility.

projects.title: Mardinnov'
projects.description: Complete redesign of the Mardinnov website for its 10th anniversary. Content was reorganized to improve clarity and usability, ensuring easier management for the site administrator while modernizing its overall look.

content.context: The representative of Mardinnov wanted to create a new website to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the event, aligned with the new graphic charter and providing a better back-office organization, which was previously based on simple articles.
content.objective: I reorganized the dashboard by creating custom content types to clearly separate the editions, the startups presenting their projects during the event, and the podcasts. I also restructured the database to meet the client’s specific needs, and carried out a complete redesign of the website to deliver a modern and optimized user experience.

projects.title: Oui'Dire Éditions
projects.description: Development of custom plugins to optimize the website’s performance and tailor its features to the specific needs of the manager, creating a more efficient and user-friendly solution.

content.context: Oui'Dire Éditions wanted to optimize their website, identify improvements for their plugins, and centralize as many features as possible on the platform.
content.objective: To meet these needs, I developed a widget to play excerpts of audiobooks and centralized the download of audiobooks on the website via an internal plugin; previously, customers relied on a paid third-party service. Now, after purchase, each customer receives an email with a code that can be entered on a dedicated page to download the products, with administrative restrictions and precise download statistics. I also created several custom shortcodes to address specific site requirements and improve overall functionality.
